roleset.name: make a false duplicate

example.name: transitive
example.text: Recently, Interpol has been focusing a lot of attention on this affair of North Korea counterfeiting currency.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'counterfeit' based on Webtext 2.5-2; nominal 'counterfeiting' based on BOLT-7. No VerbNet entry. Comparison with 'duplicate,' and 'copy.'

example.name: nominal rel: counterfeiting
example.text: The injustice and absence of social security , deterioration of the ecological environment , abuses of privilege , corruption , gap between the rich and the poor , uneven development , rampant major crimes , fraud and counterfeiting in various industries , food and pharmaceutical drug problems ......
